channel.title: CVE Feed for CRM Perks -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CRM Perks -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-38481|2023-12-19T20:00:45.781Z -- crm%20perks -- integration%20for%20woocommerce%20and%20zoho%20crm%2C%20books%2C%20invoice%2C%20inventory%2C%20bigin
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in CRM Perks Integration for WooCommerce and Zoho CRM, Books, Invoice, Inventory, Bigin.This issue affects Integration for WooCommerce and Zoho CRM, Books, Invoice, Inventory, Bigin: from n/a before 1.3.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-38478|2023-12-19T20:03:31.587Z -- crm%20perks -- integration%20for%20woocommerce%20and%20quickbooks
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in CRM Perks Integration for WooCommerce and QuickBooks.This issue affects Integration for WooCommerce and QuickBooks: from n/a through 1.2.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-47779|2023-12-07T12:11:33.370Z -- crm%20perks -- integration%20for%20constant%20contact%20and%20contact%20form%207%2C%20wpforms%2C%20elementor%2C%20ninja%20forms
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in CRM Perks. Integration for Constant Contact and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms.This issue affects Integration for Constant Contact and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms: from n/a through 1.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2023-37982|2023-12-19T20:07:31.264Z -- crm%20perks -- integration%20for%20salesforce%20and%20contact%20form%207%2C%20wpforms%2C%20elementor%2C%20ninja%20forms

item.title: CVE-2023-33311|2023-05-28T18:32:37.611Z -- crm%20perks -- contact%20form%20entries
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in CRM Perks Contact Form Entries plugin <= 1.3.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-51536|2024-02-01T10:25:53.730Z -- crm%20perks -- crm%20perks%20forms%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20form%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CRM Perks CRM Perks Forms – WordPress Form Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CRM Perks Forms – WordPress Form Builder: from n/a through 1.1.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-31212|2023-10-31T14:04:43.692Z -- crm%20perks -- database%20for%20contact%20form%207%2C%20wpforms%2C%20elementor%20forms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in CRM Perks Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms contact-form-entries allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Database for Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor forms: from n/a through 1.3.0.
